synopsis.text: Friezaâ€™s brother Cooler imprisons Future Trunks in a distant world known as the Prison Planet, prompting Son Goku, Vegeta, and Mai to embark on a rescue mission. This thrilling adventure unfolds in "Super Dragon Ball Heroes," an anime adaptation of the popular video game "Dragon Ball Heroes" that takes place shortly after the "Tournament of Power." Announced in May 2018, the promotional anime encompasses various arcs from the game and its associated manga, including the Universe Survival and Prison Planet arcs. The anime is not expected to air on TV and has been adapted for the Nintendo Switch for Western audiences. The first episode premiered on July 1, 2018, at Aeon Lake Town.
